result.value: Please submit all issues and pull requests to the [greenify/stat.seqs](http://github.com/greenify/stat.seqs) repository!
A module to analyze multiple seqs

```
stats.frequency() // calculates the relative frequency of a base at a given position
> [ { A: 0.5, C: 0.5 },
  { A: 1 },
  { C: 0.5, G: 0.25, A: 0.25 },
  { C: 0.25, G: 0.75 } ]
```

```
stats.maxLength() 
> 4
stats.gaps() // relative percentage of gaps for a column
> [0, 0, 0, 0]
```

```
stats.addSeq("AAA")
stats.addSeqs(["AAA", "AAB"])
stats.resetSeqs(["AAA", "AAB"])
stats.removeSeq("AAA")
stats.removeSeq(2) // you can also use indexes
```
